website_summaries.verdict: Great for curly hair that needs a little body and shine.
pros: Tames frizz and adds body and shine
You only need to use a small amount
cons: Users have reported issues with the nozzle breaking off

customer_reviews.title: Adds extra body to thin hair
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchell produces reliable hair care products and this sculpting foam does not disappoint. It also has a great shelf life (several years) but does require vigorous shaking prior to use or the foam comes out as a liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have dry straight thin gray hair that I fight all the time. This product takes the fight away leaving my hair soft, full bodied and a nice shine takes the place of a dull dried look. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells nice without being perfumey
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my beautician used it on my hair and it seemed to work well. I also like the smell. It's not perfumey and doesn't bother my allergies, which is a big factor for me. I like Paul Mitchell products and was pleased with this mousse. It works well with my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: Gives my hair great body while leaving it so  soft and conditioned
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE and use so many different Paul Mitchell products that I can't believe in just now trying this. I have thin, fine hair and have a 100 different volumizing products, sprays, lotions, gels, mouse, hairspray, etc. This is up there with the best working products I use. It gives me so much more body and volume but offers a slight hold and instead of leaving dry hair, it leaves my hair so dirty and conditioned. Well definitely repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Malinda SynnamonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hold, and way less stinky than competing salon brands. Plus cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair look great
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine and curly. Getting a styling product that doesn't weight it down or kill the curl is a challenge, but this mousse has met it admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Lori722

customer_reviews.title: Gives tons of volume and soft styling
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Gives thin hair a lot of volume and my still stays in place. I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Product!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! This product is counterfeit! I’ve been using Paul Mitchell products for years. This doesn’t smell or hold like the true Paul Mitchell product. Unfortunately I cannot return this so I thought I would warn others! Also, I wish I would’ve read the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Cheli

customer_reviews.title: nozzle stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a month and a half and haven't used it too many times since it doesn't seem to work any better than the regular mousse. However, now the nozzle will not dispense the foam any more. It seems to be a faulty design, possibly?? At any rate, I would not recommend buying it! I certainly won't be!
customer_reviews.author: June C. Botto

customer_reviews.title: I like that my short hair stays poofed for days the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does give body. I like that my short hair stays poofed for days the way I first style it. Love Paul Mitchell products.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hair mousse for years, I'd never use anything else. It makes my baby fine hair look full and voluminous. I get compliments a lot that I have nice hair - little do they know it's all just product.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: For soft, lasting curls
customer_reviews.text: The canister dispenses a soft creamy foam. Very good. This slim canister is 6.7 oz. A smaller size for travel would be convenient. It does a great job of producing lasting soft curls that hold. However, if you use it again for several days without rinsing it out or washing your hair; the buildup will get stiff and your hair will be stiff and straight. So use it on fresh washed hair. I really like it. Bought two. Paul Mitchell products are available almost everywhere. But this “Extra Body sculpting foam” (purple cap) was not at my local store. I wanted it specifically as it was recommended by my hair stylist.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for years but this one was sticky when dry and caused dullness...have to believe it is fake so I have pitched it in garbage.
customer_reviews.author: pj shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because not many products that advertise extra body hold up to their claims. This one is great! It gives my fine hair body and helps to hold curl for the entire day. My hair is fine and rarely will hold a curl for more than an hour. This one is doing the trick! Happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: KatD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby-fine, thinning, flyaway hair. Non-irritating, non-drying, and color safe. Later in the day, I can dampen my fingers and fluff up my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn P

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The top "valve" like dispenser does not work. I can barely get any of the product out of the canister
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Squirts all over the place - hard to make pump work
customer_reviews.text: I was unimpressed with this sculpting lotion. You can't use it without making a huge mess. The dispenser is not very efficient. Do not recommend. Bottle is also very tall.
customer_reviews.author: Margo R.

customer_reviews.title: Old stock, preservatives stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like Paul Mitchell products, but I usually dont order them because of the cost, but I went ahead this time, because of a sale, but the Mousse smells as if its ancient, its obviously out of date, turned, spoiled, however you like to say it, it STINKS and its unusable.
customer_reviews.author: 4Posey

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like this foam, takes only a small amount to work well with my hair. However as others have said there is a problem with the nozzle. It has stopped working and there is still a lot of product left. The price is reasonable but not so much if you can only access a small amount of product before the dispenser fails. It has set me to wondering if these units are company rejects that have found their way on to the market. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: ScotinAZ

customer_reviews.title: does not dull. Great lift for my baby fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, does not dull. Great lift for my baby fine hair. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: fishingchick

customer_reviews.title: The “Less” you use of is better😉just remember...
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️ X-Body Sculpting Form💋 U only need the size of a dime for short hair bc foam will expand in size; the less the better (I have found) and I love the fresh fragrance it has☺️ I’ve used Paul Mitchell for over 50 years...I really know these products😁 Have a Great Hair Day Everyone!
customer_reviews.author: kathy royce

customer_reviews.title: It’s sticky and smells funny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Paul Mitchell for many years now. His products always worked Very good on my hair. This mousse is terrible. There’s something wrong with it. It feels sticky and has an awful smell to it
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gornak

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got a bad bottle but this mousse is not good. It’s very runny and sticky. Once I disperse it through my hair and start blow drying, it feels waxy, and the blow dryer feels like it’s getting stuck on my hair where the mousse is. It also had ZERO scent. I have used Paul Mitchell products for years and they all have some fragrance but this mousse has none, just makes me think it’s old or expired. I wont buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake Paul Mitchell do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I seriously doubt this is a Paul Mitchell original product, I used it and within five minutes my head was burning my scalp was itching like crazy and white bits were all over. Iv tried to return it but no luck, so don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to give my hair a little more volume, but first of all, even when you shake it, it's a liquid mixture that comes out not foam. And it weighs down my hair and makes it look greasy:( It doesn't even spell good. Some would say you get what you pay for, but you could get one HELL of a better product than this even at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing for baby fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing for baby fine hair. If you have fine hair all this will do is make it almost impossible to comb through your hair. Didnt add body or height just stiffness and stress. Dont flush your money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect, but the delivery of it, was a fiasco, with bad information coming through for me to follow, as was told one thing, when the opposite was a fact, thus making delivery two days longer than necessary. I won't make that mistake again, and purchase things like that, locally!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mousse ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of this mousse and I honestly don’t think I’ll buy another brand! The foam doesn’t disappear as soon as you touch it, it’s not too sticky, and doesn’t dry out my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive description
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! this is only a tiny travel size which is not stated in the description. For $7 I thought I was getting a full sized product
customer_reviews.author: GreeneyesTN

customer_reviews.title: I like the results though
customer_reviews.text: This foam was surprising because it comes out of the container as a liquid and then foams up. I had to learn to put some in my palm and then apply it to my hair. I like the results though. My hair can be shaped but is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my fine hair feeling oily
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this doesn't always come out as foam. I get some foam and some liquid that doesn't get aerated. Description mentions that it moisturizes/conditions, but it leaves my fine hair feeling oily and staticky after use. Has decent hold for part of the day, but by the end of the day it has weighed my hair down. Not my favorite mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Demmari

customer_reviews.title: Love the Compan
customer_reviews.text: I like this company because they are cruelty free, but this foam seems to leave a sticky layer that weighs down my hair. Additionally, by the end of the day my hair is full of static. I guess I will keep looking for a cruelty free moose that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Graeve

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Paul Mitchell standards
customer_reviews.text: Thought this product was damaged somehow, so I ordered another. Both cans dispense a very runny liquid which only foams once it is in your hands. It makes my hair feel stiff, instead of manageable. Truly one of the worst hair care products I've used; very surprising for Paul Mitchell, since I've been using other Paul Mitchell products for years.
customer_reviews.author: kchatelaine

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my hairdresser for my baby fine hair. Works well without dulling or drying.
customer_reviews.author: merrymaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. I have very thin hair and this is not heavy at all
customer_reviews.author: Tupper's View

customer_reviews.title: I apply it on my hair every time I wash ...
customer_reviews.text: I apply it on my hair every time I wash it. It helps me a lot with my hairdo. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Missing cap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mousse. However when the order arrived the canister was missing its cap. The can bounced around inside the box and the nozzle is now loose. I hope it works. I'll update the review if it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy over and over
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff I bought it before and I ran out so it was time for me to buy some more it's great it doesn't leave a lot of heaviness in your hair or product build-up. And it gives your hair just enough volume and control that you need
customer_reviews.author: Tina Delph

customer_reviews.title: A Good Hair Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to style my hair. Only a small amount is needed to do the job. It has no scent. I have used this product for years and continue to reorder when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Volume and body are must with my short spikes! I love this mousse better than any I’ve used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitive scalp so I have to be careful how much I use of the product. It serves it's purpose, as I have a lot of fine hair that needs some lift and texture. Good price for the product. Thick, creamy mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bottle without realizing it was the smaller bottle. This is my favorite mousse...provides a nice hold with my curls. I add a curl cream after applying the mousse to soften the texture of my hair. I highly recommend this mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia T. Murillo-renard

customer_reviews.title: Extra-body Sculpting Foam vs Sculpting Foam
customer_reviews.text: The red cap sculpting foam has a firmer and longer hold. This extra-body sculpting foam does increase volume. I prefer a wet look with a strong hold on scrunched body curls, typically my hair looks better the day after and then holds up for 3 to 4 days when using the Sculpting foam, unlike the extra-body SF my hair was slightly wavy by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Like the red cap better for standard hold which holds just as good as this. This goes on thick but doesn’t hold your hair any better. This makes your hair feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J

customer_reviews.title: couldn't live without this product
customer_reviews.text: This sounds dramatic but nothing has ever worked so well and it leaves my hair shiny and bouncy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Bass

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I found this just okay. I don't love the smell, and didn't care for the texture. My hair did well for the first few hours and then it seems to droop. If you have medium to thick hair it probably works better.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Second bottle I’ve used of this product. I have fine curly hair. This product gives it body, curl, and moisturizes, while taking the frizz out. I hope they keep making it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 4 because it was sticky on hair.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as well as from salon
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work nearly as well as when I have bought it from my hairdresser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for volume without the frizz
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser used this on me before blow drying and styling. I have never seen my long hair look so full and gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order in cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, however, I will never order another aerosol product in the winter. When it arrived the product comes out of the can like liquid and takes a minute to foam up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. West

customer_reviews.title: Great while the nozzle works
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, but the container is poorly made. It's still well over half full and the nozzle has stopped working. It's impossible to dispense any more product.
customer_reviews.author: noadjectives

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My flat hair isn’t flat anymore and lasts for days without washing.
customer_reviews.author: Darina

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have thinning nearly 70 year old hair. Out of all the volume products I have used, this one actually works for me! I will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Garland

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: Generally a good product. However this particular Item was defective. It is supposed to be a foam and it came out as a liquid. Could not be shaken enough to create a foam. Ineligible for return. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: MEC

customer_reviews.title: Gave it Away
customer_reviews.text: Small amount had my hair oily. I have thin light natural hair. Will try another brand
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle stops working.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The bottle is not. Second bottle in a row the nozzle has stopped working. With the first purchase, I thought it was my fault. Now I don't think so. I bought this to have on hand and have only used it twice. Will not produce any foam.
customer_reviews.author: ralph1

customer_reviews.title: Makes your hair soft, less frizzy, adds volume
customer_reviews.text: The only mouse I will ever buy. Scent is awesome, makes your hair have volume and come alive.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Body
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair, and this gives it a little volume boost. Just a small bit works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Yes. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Right after shampooing; distribute foam throughout the root area. Blow-dry. No sticky build-up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marina🌿

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foam for several years. It doesn't leave your hair sticky and works great for short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t foam very well
customer_reviews.text: The foam is a little flat when it comes out of the bottle, no matter how long I shake it. I guess it doesn’t ship well. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Like this after washing my hair - helps to style & manage. You only.use a little bit so a can lasts a long, long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy HannonAmazon Custome  kathy hannon

customer_reviews.title: Good bodifier doesn't make your hair stiff
customer_reviews.text: I used this bodifier after I shampoo to give my hair volume nd hide my scalp which is it does very well it's not stiff but it has body when you blow dry your hair
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Curly Hair Combo 2
customer_reviews.text: Great for curly frizzy hair when used as part of my 3 part paul mitchell regiment.
customer_reviews.author: ShelbyLive

customer_reviews.title: Still great.
customer_reviews.text: Was great in the 80’s when I had lots of hair. Just used it again after all these years and still great product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Like this for my hair. Been using it for years. Now order online. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Romantic in CA

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It really does add volume to baby fine hair, perfect especially for wavy or curly fine hair that you’re trying to boost. It also has almost no smell, which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of my hair after using but the hold doesn’t last overnight
customer_reviews.author: blondie007

customer_reviews.title: Too late.
customer_reviews.text: I made a purchase for a trip. It was suppose to come in 2 days before I left but it did not come in. They kept pushing back the delivery. I know the products are good because I use them but I wanted travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product, I use all Paul Mitchell Products
customer_reviews.text: I am sad because I bought this item and after a 2 uses the can is full but the foam will not come out. I only bought this product on line because my local retail store (Cosmo Prof) was closed due to Covid. I would be happy to ship back so that you can see for yourself that I can not dispense the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: For my hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the sculpting cream for my hair, my hair looks thicker
customer_reviews.author: Pat Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mousse for years, it's light, yet gives my fine hair volume. I use only Paul Mitchell products.
customer_reviews.author: WebDeb777

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchell works well every time; not greasy, but doesn't leave hair dry; provides volume
customer_reviews.author: Salgal

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. In my opinion this product is fake. It doesn’t have the traditional Paul Mitchell smell, and the product did nothing for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Best mousse out there
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because I have very thin hair and it gives me great body
customer_reviews.author: Angus A Bryan

customer_reviews.title: BIG Hair is back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it easy to travel with gives tons of volume to my hair
customer_reviews.author: samsmom1098

customer_reviews.title: It's a yes from me
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair product I have ever used. Your hair will not be crunchy no matter how much you put in
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use it once, the nozzle is almost impossible to press down and it also hurts, hardly any of the product came out. It's going straight to the garbage, I won't be bothered trying it again. If I could write a review with no stars I would. I'm wondering how long ago this product was manufactured, it has to be OLD!
customer_reviews.author: CharSera

customer_reviews.title: Gives body without weighing hair down
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Hair doesn't seem heavy, but def has more thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I usually let my naturally wavy hair air dry. This is the only product I've found that doesn't produce frizzy hair when I comb through after my hair is dry.
customer_reviews.author: M Moore

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and tacky
customer_reviews.text: Crunchy and stuff. It that’s you’re thing you’ll like it. But I found it to make my hair tacky and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I used the new container only twice and it stopped working. Can’t get the product to come out of the nozzle
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Liming

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The best I have used for my curly hair... not heavy on your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Kingery

customer_reviews.title: great styling mousse
customer_reviews.text: i have used this for several weeks and find it really works to add volume
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The can is dented. The plastic cap is broken and half of it is missing. The nozzle is damaged and cannot dispense the product. Cannot return because it is flammable. No way to contact Amazon for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Great gel
customer_reviews.text: I have used the sculpting gel for a long time!! Has great hold!
customer_reviews.author: shirleyt

customer_reviews.title: Puts volume in the hair.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work like it's supposed to and add volume.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Collins

customer_reviews.title: love ittt
customer_reviews.text: I love this mousse so much! It smells amazing and it doesn't leave your hair feeling thick or stiff like the other ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Are use this product to add volume to my hair. I have fine hair. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Beanie

customer_reviews.title: Youthful hair in a foam!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how fluffy and full that it made my hair feel and look. It is very light and did not make my hair feel heavy and thick and brittle like the others do.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Charles

customer_reviews.title: It will be great to take traveling
customer_reviews.text: I needed a travel-size foam - this is very similar to the one I use at home. It will be great to take traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great company.  Very smooth transaction.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try a new product for a change. Great decision. Love this sculpting foam. It left my hair set and with shine that had been lacking for a long time. I definitely recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Fiesty

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: Leaves hair feeling like it has a heavy coating on it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Hold pretty well but not as well as I expected. Nonetheless, it works well enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mateus Madden

customer_reviews.title: Great price ... Amazon is the cheapest around for this mousse
customer_reviews.text: This really holds well and Amazon had the best price
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Basini

customer_reviews.title: Gives you so much body .
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very fine and Paul Mitchell Sculping Foam gives me so much body . I have used it for years . Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Cecile Boulette

customer_reviews.title: No difference compared to what I use.
customer_reviews.text: Comes out of the can almost as liquid vs. foam. I have fine thin hair and use Garnier Ski High gel but thought this product would be better.
customer_reviews.author: ELLEN C.

customer_reviews.title: This is just a mousse for one's hair
customer_reviews.text: It is one of many I use on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped dispensing
customer_reviews.text: I have used Paul Mitchell for about 30 years. Always loved the sculptering foam. First time ordering from Amazon. I have about 2/3 left and it stopped dispensing. First time ever.
customer_reviews.author: Grams

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell Extra-Body Sculpting Foam
product_meta.description:
Size:6.7 Fl. OzPrep hair for a voluminous blowout with Extra-Body Sculpting Foam from Paul Mitchell. Ideal for fine hair, this body-building mousse adds lush volume, providing fullness and control. The thickening formula also contains conditioning ingredients to amplify shine and lock in moisture, leaving hair manageable and shiny. Hair Type: Ideal for Fine Hair. Fragrance: A complex citrus herbal scent with energizing notes of lemon and neroli and additional calming notes of chamomile, peony and rose. Stylist Tip: Use to create bouncy blowouts and to keep hair looking voluminous and polished.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell is results-driven hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
